ComicInfo.Summary: The Eagle, Eisner and Harvey Award nominated anthology returns this month with yet another issue packed with today's top creators and tomorrow's brightest talents. Each issue is a smorgasbord of tales sure to appeal to all tastes.

ComicInfo.Title: Dear Mr. Pekar; Playfully Malicious; See a Penny, Pick It Up; Bring Back My Brigham to Me!; Fear is the Greatest Challenge; Showdown in Space; Projdi Vilo ("Soar, Lady"); Jack's Riff; Nemo Chapter 20; Me, Myself and Time
